amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds appropriated for the Upper Colorado River Basin Fund by $5.1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds appropriated for the Upper Colorado River Basin Fund by $5.1 million, from $417,301,000 to $412,180,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 151 - 275 (Roll no. 484).
